short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync your Stadia captures to Google Drive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stratos lets you sync any Stadia captures to your Google Drive account, where they can then be stored without taking from your Stadia storage limits or shared with others. For details and usage information, please see the main web site.
